Title: Prom gown with Metal Floral Belt

Featured-image: JC3780-sky-blue-gold-prom-gown-with-metal-floral-belt_p.jpg

----

Description: This prom or homecoming gown is beautiful. Any girl would want to wear this gown. With its floor length train, the bodice is a sweetheart neckline with beading and sparkles that create a leaf design. The A-line dress is set off with a the metal leaf belt at the waistline. Gorgeous and perfect for many special events.
